org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.executionplan

Interface ChannelInitializer


  • public interface ChannelInitializer
    Sets up the usage of Channel in an ExecutionPlan for a given Platform.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel setUpOutput(ChannelDescriptor descriptor, Channel source, OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
      Optional operation. Creates a new Channel incident* to the source.
      Tuple<Channel,Channel> setUpOutput(ChannelDescriptor descriptor, OutputSlot<?> outputSlot, OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
      Optional operation. Creates a new Channel adjacent* to an ExecutionOperator's outputSlot.
      default ChannelInitializer unchecked()
      Deprecated. 
      not needed anymore

    • Method Detail

      • setUpOutput

        Tuple<Channel,Channel> setUpOutput(ChannelDescriptor descriptor,
                                   OutputSlot<?> outputSlot,
                                   OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
        Optional operation. Creates a new Channel adjacent* to an ExecutionOperator's outputSlot.

        * Note that in general the created Channel is not necessarily directly adjacent to the outputSlot, but a chain Channels (and ExecutionTasks) might be in betweeen.

        Parameters:
        descriptor - describes the Channel to be created
        outputSlot - whose output the Channel should accept
        optimizationContext - provides estimates and accepts new Operators
        Returns:
        Channel that is directly output by the outputSlot and the Channel that was actually requested; both are interlinked.

      • setUpOutput

        Channel setUpOutput(ChannelDescriptor descriptor,
                    Channel source,
                    OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
        Optional operation. Creates a new Channel incident* to the source.

        * Note that in general the created Channel is not necessarily directly incident to the source, but a chain Channels (and ExecutionTasks) might be in betweeen.

        Parameters:
        descriptor - describes the Channel to be created
        source - that should be exposed as a new Channel
        optimizationContext - provides estimates and accepts new Operators
        Returns:
        the set up Channel

      • unchecked

        default ChannelInitializer unchecked()
        Deprecated. not needed anymore
        Erases the type variable from this instance.
        Returns:
        this instance, casted
